title: About ADALab
text:
About ADALab
We investigate how viral infections and co-infections shape the immune system and cancer progression.

title: Instruments
text:
import yaml, html from IPython.display import HTML, display

Load YAML
with open(â€œdata/instruments.ymlâ€,â€œrâ€,encoding=â€œutf-8â€) as f: inst = yaml.safe_load(f) or []
inst.sort(key=lambda x: (x.get(â€œcategoryâ€,â€œâ€œ), x.get(â€nameâ€,â€œâ€œ)))


Pure HTML only (avoid Markdown headers so blocks donâ€™t split HTML)
css = â€œâ€œâ€

â€œâ€œâ€
html_out = [â€œ] cats = [] for item in inst: c = item.get(â€œcategoryâ€,â€œâ€œ) if c not in cats: cats.append(c)
for c in cats: html_out.append(fâ€

{html.escape(c)}

â€œ) html_out.append(â€™

â€™) for it in [x for x in inst if x.get(â€œcategoryâ€,â€œâ€œ)==c]: name = html.escape(it.get(â€œnameâ€,â€œâ€œ)) vendor = html.escape(it.get(â€vendorâ€,â€œâ€œ)) if it.get(â€vendorâ€) else â€œâ€ summary= html.escape(it.get(â€œsummaryâ€,â€œâ€œ)) if it.get(â€summaryâ€) else â€œâ€ img = it.get(â€œimageâ€) specs = it.get(â€œspecsâ€) or {} links = it.get(â€œlinksâ€) or [] tags = it.get(â€œtagsâ€) or []
    card = ['<div class="inst-card">']
    if img: card.append(f"<img src='{html.escape(img)}' alt='{name}'>")
    card.append(f"<h3>{name}</h3>")
    if vendor:  card.append(f"<p><strong>{vendor}</strong></p>")
    if summary: card.append(f"<p>{summary}</p>")
    if specs:
        card.append("<dl class='inst-specs'>")
        for k, v in specs.items():
            card.append(f"<dt>{html.escape(str(k))}</dt><dd>{html.escape(str(v))}</dd>")
        card.append("</dl>")
    if links:
        line = " Â· ".join(
            f"<a href='{html.escape(l['url'])}' target='_blank' rel='noopener'>{html.escape(l['text'])}</a>"
            for l in links if 'url' in l and 'text' in l
        )
        if line: card.append(f"<p>{line}</p>")
    if tags:
        card.append("<div class='inst-badges'>" + "".join(f"<span>{html.escape(str(t))}</span>" for t in tags) + "</div>")
    card.append("</div>")
    html_out.append("".join(card))
html_out.append("</div>")  # close grid for this category
display(HTML(css + â€œâ€œ.join(html_out)))
